subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
ianm@brick.net wrote:
> Dear Donny,

> Now, you probably will keep using that global cooling thing, and the bit
> about needing carbon dioxide, but, since I have called you on it, just
> remember that you now know better, every time you use it.

No he doesn't, and he never will.

You're wasting your time. How long did that take? Twenty minutes? A half 
hour? That's precious time you'll never get back. Nice try though.

> Of course, I have a sneaking suspicion that, as someone from
> jesusanswers.com, you figure that the Second Coming will just take care of
> any messes people make.

In his case, it's the new god. The one signed with a capital G.
